Text: New constituent Tyler Mosher is the daughter of Overland Park Police Officer Mike Mosher who was killed in the line of duty in May of 2020.  We discussed how to better support law enforcement and the families our fallen heroes leave behind. https://t.co/5Q6Je71Pdk
